STLUtility::AutoContainer< T > Class Template Reference

deletes all values in a container when it goes out of scope Usage: AutoContainer< vector<SomeClass*> > myVector; This will delete all pointers in myVector when it goes out of scope. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class STLUtility::AutoContainer< T >

deletes all values in a container when it goes out of scope Usage: AutoContainer< vector<SomeClass*> > myVector; This will delete all pointers in myVector when it goes out of scope.
